text: Katonda tateekanga munda wa muntu mitima ebiri, era bakyala ba mmwe abo be mulayira obuteegatta nabo Katonda tabafuulanga ba Maama ba mmwe, olw'okuba nti muba mugambye nti emigongo gyabwe giringa egya ba nnyammwe, era abaana be mufuula abaana ba mmwe (nga si mmwe mu bazaala) tabafuula baana ba mmwe, ebyo mmwe bigambo byammwe bye mwogera obwogezi n'emimwa gya mmwe. Era Katonda ayogera mazima, era yye y'alaga e kkubo (erisaana okukwata)
